cause.description:
Adam has been plying on his old Peavey Raptor for much tooo long now. He Needs a New guitar to Rock out to his full potential. Help Adam get a new Gibson Les Paul
1. Adam needs to rock harder
2. Shiner new guitar
3. Sexyness
cause.mission: to raise enough funds so that Adam can purchased a Gibson Les Paul
cause.name: Get Adam a Les Paul
